sentences.english: Federer is the French Open champion at last after beating Robin Soderling in straight sets at Roland Garros.
sentences.chinese: 費德勒直落三盤擊敗索德林，最終問鼎法網冠軍。

sentences.english: Winning those points could have won us the league.
sentences.chinese: 下個賽季拿到更多分可能讓我們問鼎英超。

sentences.english: Since then a Team Yatai group with irresistible force, finally aspires to seize the superior.
sentences.chinese: 自此之後亞泰隊一路勢如破竹，最終問鼎中超。

sentences.english: In 1987, Biden made his first bid for the Democratic presidential nomination.
sentences.chinese: 拜登於1987年首次問鼎民主黨總統候選人席位。
